Contributor: McNeill, J., artist.; Gale & Polden, printer.;
Note: Signed "J. McNeill." Date based on dates of 1st World War. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: A recruiting poster for the Royal Navy. Illustration shows various experiences the men in the navy have, such as recreation, going on leave, being in the Mediterranean and being on the China station.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
